annotations:
Ref: YI-CH-12-08-2024-10:30:00 AM

/ Yevgen

Good day,

MV Blue Crystal 78K DWT / 2012 - OPEN GIJON, SPAIN ON ABT 25 - 30.08.2024

CAN TRY ANY

Class: BV
Flag /Year built: Panama / August 2012
Type of vessel: Singledeck, Selftrimming Bulkcarrier
Summer DWT / Draft / TPC :   abt 78,103 MT / abt 14.328 m / abt 67.7
Winter DWT / Draft / TPC     :   abt 76,090 MT / abt 14.030 m / abt 67.5
Grain capacity: abt 3,262,042 cu.ft.
Gear : Gearless
Holds / Hatches : 7/7
Type of Hatchcovers : Side Rolling
LOA / Beam :  abt 224.98 m / abt 32.26 m
International GRT/NRT : 41,963 / 25,974

Speed & Consumption                      

Laden: about 13.0 knts on about 35.0 tns VLSFO plus about 0.2 tns LSMGO/day
Ballast: about 13.5 knts on about 34.0 tns VLSFO plus about 0.2 tns LSMGO/day

Alternative Speed & Consumption                                                                 

Laden: about 12.0 knts on about 25.0 tns VLSFO plus about 0.2 tns LSMGO/day
Ballast: about 12.5 knts on about 25.0 tns VLSFO plus about 0.2 tns LSMGO/day

In good weather condition, not exceeding Beaufort 4 / Douglas sea state 3 (significant wave height 0.5 m - 1.25m), not against adverse current and no swell. Favourable currents shall 
not be taken into account when calculating vessel's performance. Vessel can only be instructed to sail at described speeds. The first and last 24 hours of any sea passage being 
excluded, also excluded periods with reduction of speed, in straits, tidal affected waters, frequently course alterations, high risk piracy areas, due reasons of safety or on Charterers 
orders.

Port / Anchorage Consumption  :   

Idle: abt 3.5 tns VLSFO per day plus abt 0.2 tns LSMGO per day
Loading / Discharging: abt 4.5 tns VLSFO per day plus abt 0.2 tns LSMGO/day

All above consumptions exclude ballasting/deballasting operations which require additional abt 1.5 tns VLSFO per day

ALL ABOUT


Best regards,
Yevgen Ivanov
(as agents only)

***********************************************
For and on behalf of
Speed Logistics Marine Ltd
mob:+30-694-346-50-08
Skype: ivanovyevgen1994
***********************************************
